#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    char ch;
    scanf("%c",&ch);
    while(t--)
    {
        string s;
        getline(cin,s);
        int n=s.length(),i=0;

        while(i<n-1)
        {
            if(s[i]!=' '&&s[i+1]!=' ')
            {

                cout<<(s[i]-97)*(s[i]-97)<<"-";

            }
                else if(s[i]!=' '&&s[i+1]==' ')
                {
                    cout<<(s[i]-97)*(s[i]-97)<<"$";
                    i++;

                }
                i++;
        }
        if(isalpha(s[i]))
        cout<<(s[i]-97)*(s[i]-97)<<"\n";
        else
            cout<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
